properties.areaDesc: Southern Rocky Mountain Front; Jefferson; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 5:13PM MST until February 8 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2
inches at lower elevations, 2 to 4 inches in the mountains.
Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Central and Southern Lewis and Clark, Southern Rocky
Mountain Front and Jefferson.

* WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING
